ing: 1 (5 ounce) can chunk light tuna, drained
1/4 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle WhipÂ®)
des: "Something a little different to have on some nice crisp torn lettuce leaves or in a sandwich. Gala and Pink Lady apples are my favorites for this."
ins: Stir the tuna, salad dressing, egg, apple, and pecans together in a bowl; season with salt and pepper. Chill in refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
